title: 1978 Colgate Red Raiders football team
text:
The 1978 Colgate Red Raiders football team was an <a href="American%20football">American football</a> team that represented <a href="Colgate%20University">Colgate University</a> as an independent during the <a href="1978%20NCAA%20Division%20I-A%20football%20season">1978 NCAA Division I-A football season</a>. In its third season under head coach <a href="Frederick%20Dunlap%20%28American%20football%29">Frederick Dunlap</a>, the team compiled a 3–8 record. Doug Curtis and Dick Slenker were the team captains. 
The team played its home games at <a href="Andy%20Kerr%20Stadium">Andy Kerr Stadium</a> in <a href="Hamilton%20%28village%29%2C%20New%20York">Hamilton, New York</a>.
Leading players.
